body:
Today, Maxim Group lowered its price target on Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) to $164.00 per share.

There are 3 sell ratings, 8 hold ratings, 37 buy ratings, 2 strong buy ratings on the stock.

The current consensus rating on Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) is Buy (Score: 2.76) with a consensus target price of $129.85 per share, a potential 7.06% upside.

Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) pays an annual dividend of $2.28 with a yield of 1.88% and an average dividend growth of 9.80% based on a 3 Year Average..

Recent Insider Trading Activity For Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL)

Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) has insider ownership of 0.08% and institutional ownership of 58.93%.
